body.name: Softfree Lighted Folding Makeup Mirror, 1X/10X Magnification Double Sided Mirror, 5.9Inch LED Vanity Mirror for Travel, Home (White)

features: 📦️Package including: Double sided 1X mirror & 10X reflective surface lighted make-up mirror in colour printed box. Support USB with data cable, no battery.

🔍️Clear reflection 10x mirror: Our mirror can switch between 1x and 10x reflective surface. The 10x magnification mirror only works at close range. You need to get close.. Open the folded mirror, use 1X magnification to makeup the whole face, and use 10X to enlarge the part to see pores more clearly.

💄 Soft gloss makeup mirror: Our foldable mirror has 21 LED beads, enough to illuminate the entire mirror but not too bright to irritate the eyes. Soft light makes makeup more comfortable, whether it is dressing table, bathroom, hotel or outdoors.

🛫 Perfect travel companion: Our foldable mirror holds only 5.9 by 5.9 by 2 inches. Batteries are not included so you can take it with you on any vehicle. The adjustable Angle illuminates your beauty 180 degrees.
❤ Rest assured to buy: We are committed to providing satisfactory service. If there is any dissatisfaction within 90 days, we will try our best to give you a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Softfree is committed to providing satisfactory products. Only high quality can make people trust. Our makeup mirror is simple in design and powerful. The more luxurious the product, the less complex the design. We cut down all the unnecessary baggage to highlight the mirror itself. Foldable mirrors that can rotate freely are good companions for travel and daily use.

Enlarged function makeup mirror makes your eyes more comfortable. The makeup mirror that does not have magnification function is in use when always force us to be in processing detail infinite press close to it. This makes our backs ache and our eyes tire more easily. Our 10x magnification makeup mirror allows you to easily handle the details of your face, relieve eye strain, and avoid bending and twisting your neck. The 10x magnification function allows you to see clearly.

1X and 10X magnification easily switch 1X mirror is essential for daily face Makeup. 10X magnifying makeup mirror is very effective for details. Our mirrors are the perfect combination of these two parts, whether you're applying base makeup, eyeliner, contouring, lipstick, contact lenses our mirrors are very helpful for you.

Lens LED lamp bead The new transmission LED lamp bead, based on the principle of optical refraction, uniformly emits non-glare light through the reflection of the mirror, increasing the refractive index, making the space brighter. Fine interior construction The hd surface glass, the interior 21 yellow and white led bright light beads. Simulates natural light and covers soft light panels. It's milder without hurting the eyes. Two ways to facilitate power supply Our mirror has no battery inside, so it can be a safe travel companion. You can use USB power when you need light or use 4 AA batteries.

It's a surprise for women Our makeup mirror is small and light. 5.9 "storage size, 12" high spread. It has little compartments that can be used to hold bits and pieces of the table. It's the perfect decoration for the makeup table and the perfect travel mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as it was pictured.
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift, but was delivered without being in a box. It was in original box, so it wasn't a surprise. I don't know where the fault lies, but I wasn't happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a a folding travel mirror that is a Beautifive brand and I love it. I decided to order one for my sister. This Softfree looked identical to it and was less expensive. However, when I received it, the quality wasn’t even close. The mirror was loose in the frame, it was hard to tell which side was magnified (it was suppose to be 10x) and it kept folding down when it was suppose to stand straight. I returned it. Spend the extra money on quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s supposed to be magnified 10x. I have the same mirror but an older version. I need to see my face up close, and the old mirror works better than the new one. I will be sending it back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear mirror, strong magnification, good lighting
reviews.reviewText: Would have preferred a little smaller one but this works out ok. Nice that it folds up flat and doesn’t need to be plugged in. I left the plastic in the top side because I only use it for the magnification. That way it stays clea and not dusty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Slightly large than I expected, but that's on me for not paying attention. Dimensions are correct. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Falls over using the 10x side
reviews.reviewText: Everything works, the lights, mirror magnification, the tray to hold items is helpful. My biggest issue is that you can't prop it open to see the 10x side at an angle that is helpful without it falling over. The bar does not have much bend flexibility or a way to lock it in place so as soon as you tilt the mirror up slightly, it's too imbalance from being top heavy and falls over or doesn't have the flexion needed. A weighted bottom and hinges that open more would have helped alot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars E. Z PIZIE
reviews.reviewText: Travels fantastically, Don't expect Excellence for such an affordable product, it will get the job done, saty realistic in ur expectations and this is a joy to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the way I can fold it and take it with me.
reviews.reviewText: I need the 10 magnification and it folds easy for taking on trips.
The mirrors are just glued on and one immediately fell off. I was able to glue it back on again but the poor craftsmanship was disappointing
